metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9471 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
In ytnef 1.9.2, the SwapWord function in lib/ytnef.c allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9471` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libytnef0 - 1.5-6ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libytnef package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5-6ubuntu0.2').
